text.section: The Commissioner shall employ correctional employees to monitor and provide security for inmates in the program.

A correctional employee designated to monitor inmates in the program may:
obtain and execute search warrants as authorized under § 3-415 of this subtitle; and
make arrests as authorized under § 2-207 of the Criminal Procedure Article.

A correctional employee authorized to make arrests under this section shall:
meet the minimum qualifications required by the Maryland Police Training Commission; and
complete satisfactorily the training prescribed by the Maryland Police Training Commission.
